fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Decide if you will go on Alert at night. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
If a player visits you at all, remove them from any factional chats they're in, and make it so they can no longer send or receive whispers from their faction members if they're part of an evil faction with a factional chat.
If a player visits you while you're on alert, you will be alerted of who they are and they will become a random Neutral Benign role, or a Neutral Benign role of the host's choice.
On alert, your defense is Basic.
